best_practices: Focus on search intent, not just search volume
Target long-tail keywords for better conversion

on_page_optimization.title_tags: Include primary keyword, keep under 60 characters
on_page_optimization.headers: Use H1 for main title, H2-H6 for structure
on_page_optimization.internal_linking: Link to relevant pages with descriptive anchor text
on_page_optimization.content_optimization: Write for users first, optimize for search engines second

content_strategy.freshness: Regular content updates and new publications
